data.actual_result: You'll see a jagged avatar. Example:
data.expected_result: Circle with avatar is supposed to be clean/smooth.
data.short_description: Avatars on Discord have very jagged edges.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find any user with a light avatar (e.g white) and view their -profile - Observe that the circle is not smoothly rendered on screen. - Note that this problem affects dark avatars, but it's harder to notice since Discord is dark by default
